name: Quantum OSGi Framework
short_description:
The Quantum OSGi Framework provides core services and ready made modules that allow for applications to be composite based.  

Modules are vertical slices, providing entities, services and integration for a particular area of an application.  Modules such as User, Accounts, Products, CMS, Security, Financial Gateway etc.  Each providing there own domain models and services to allow for an application to be composed rather than developed.  

The framework consists of core APIs and utilities, as well a integration, persistence and web/UI services.  Modules will be assembled and extended, allowing for any kind of application to be created.  Why constantly recreate the same code for each application?  With modular style development the services can be reused and refined to perfection within the open source community.
summary: An OSGi application framework for modular development.
